header.gameNote: NIT SEASON TIP-OFF AT INDIANAPOLIS IN

article.headline: Notre Dame 92, Lafayette 60
article.story: INDIANAPOLIS (AP) -- Russell Carter scored 20 points and Notre Dame turned 26 Lafayette turnovers into 31 points during a 92-60 victory Tuesday night in the consolation round of the NIT Season Tip-Off. The Irish (2-1) dominated the boards against the Leopards (1-2), raced ahead by 16 points at halftime and steadily built their lead to 36 points late in the final period. Luke Harangody, Notre Dame's burly freshman super-sub, added 18 points for his third straight game in double figures. Rob Kurz had 16 points, Tory Jackson added 10 points and Kyle McAlarney had 12 assists for the Irish. Notre Dame led 46-30 at halftime, then Harangody had two baskets and two free throws in less than 3 minutes as the Irish built a 60-38 lead early in the second half. Notre Dame continued pulling away, and Harangody's final basket and one of two free throws by freshman Jonathon Peoples gave the Irish their biggest lead at 90-54 with less than 2 minutes remaining. Lafayette, which did not get an offensive rebound or a point off turnovers until the closing minutes against Notre Dame's reserves, was led by the 10 points of Matt Betley, its only player in double figures. Indiana played Butler in the second round for one of four regional championships and a spot next week in the tourney semifinals in New York.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
